function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on zoonotic and vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Neglect of other potential health risks in the built environment","Mitigation":"Expand research and consideration of non-zoonotic and non-vector-borne diseases","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of articles with limited sampling points to green spaces","Impact":"Potential omission of disease spread in non-green urban areas","Mitigation":"Include studies that encompass a broader range of urban environments","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, remote sensing, data collection tools","People":"Researchers, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, local government"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on wildlife health capacity in urban environments","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of urbanization on wildlife disease spread","Mitigation":"Conduct studies on wildlife health in relation to urbanization, consider ecological determinants","Technologies":"Wildlife health monitoring tools, ecological modeling software","People":"Wildlife researchers, ecologists, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations"}]}
